article.title: Aerosol properties in the atmospheres of extrasolar giant planets

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the black line in Figure 1 represent?
Which material demonstrates the highest resistance to extreme temperatures according to Figure 2?
What does the grey band in Figure 3 represent?
choices: Range of possible temperature profiles for HD 189733 b.
Range of possible pressures in the atmosphere of HD 189733 b.
Uncertainty in the retrieved temperature profile of HD 189733 b.
Range of skin temperatures anticipated for HD 189733 b.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary factor that limits the growth of aerosol particles in the upper atmosphere of HD 209458 b according to Figure 5?
